pages.title: Camellia Plant
pages.text: A camellia shrub generated in a jungle.

pages.title: Generation
pages.text: {b Camellia}, actually a blend of real-life tea plants and ornamental {i Camellia} species, is a multipurpose shrub generated naturally in jungles.
As time goes by, camellia shrubs will have a product block grown on its top and show different growth stages, each stage has a specific product.

pages.title: Shoots
pages.text: {b Fresh camellia shoots} are the products of the earliest growth stage. They are the raw materials of {em tea}.

pages.title: Flowers
pages.text: {b Camellia flowers} are the products during the second growth stage, and are ingredients to make a {em white dye}.

pages.title: Seeds
pages.text: {b Camellia seeds}, products of the third growth stage, are used to produce {em oil}, similar to walnuts in Caupona. You can also use the seeds with dirt and water in a dolium to grow a new camellia shrub.
